Service Details: - Delivers environmental, social, and economic benefits by coordinating activities with partners in order to provide access to technology, to increase skill development and educational opportunities for Canadians- Refurbishes and delivers technology and training donated by government organizations, private businesses and individuals- Works in support of digital inclusion and economic participation by youth, seniors, low-income Canadians, new Canadians, First Nations, Metis and Inuit peoples, and other eligible beneficiaries
